name: Aradin The True Hero
description:
Short top-down game about the knight and the useless squire. But in this game you will control not an epic hero, but his little weak squire. Оr is it the other way around?

Game was development special for Sonicworkflow's Valentine's Day Jam

Theme is "Cringe"

Used free assets:
knight: https://oco.itch.io/medieval-fantasy-character-pack
main character: https://gamekrazzy.itch.io/8-direction-top-down-character
tiles: https://opengameart.org/content/lots-of-free-2d-tiles-and-sprites-by-hyptosis
goblin: https://luizmelo.itch.io/monsters-creatures-fantasy
girl: https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-heroine
sounds: https://www.zapsplat.com
font 1: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Roboto+Slab
font 2: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Fredoka+One
tools:  http://dotween.demigiant.com/
sounds:  https://www.zapsplat.com
